channel.title: Error while trying to run a client!
channel.description:
Running a .bat file to start server and having issues with java, help please
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hi, whenever I try to start a server, I run the .bat file, and when cmd pops up i get the following error ""An error occurred during initiaztion of VM, could not reserve enough space for object heap could not create the java virutal machine, press any key to continue""
I have the latest java 6 update 10, my path and everything is set up. How do i fix this?

item.title: Error while trying to run a client!
item.dc:creator: @saintspader saintspader
item.description:
@saintspader wrote:

Running a .bat file to start server and having issues with java, help please

Hi, whenever I try to start a server, I run the .bat file, and when cmd pops up i get the following error
““An error occurred during initiaztion of VM, could not reserve enough space for object heap
could not create the java virutal machine, press any key to continue””

I have the latest java 6 update 10, my path and everything is set up. How do i fix this?
